001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.loader;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.AbstractComponentService;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.factory.ComponentFactory;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.log.LogUi;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
008import org.openqa.selenium.By;
009
010/**
011 * Implementation of the {@link LoaderService} interface providing operations for checking the visibility
012 * of loader elements, as well as waiting for their appearance or removal. Extends
013 * {@link AbstractComponentService} to manage creation and retrieval of {@link Loader} instances.
014 *
015 * <p>This class uses {@link LoaderComponentType} to identify loader components within a UI automation
016 * framework, ensuring consistent interactions whether loaders are located via a container or a direct
017 * locator.
018 *
019 * <p>All methods delegate to an internal {@link Loader} instance, retrieved or created on-demand,
020 * to execute the underlying logic of showing or removing loaders within specified timeframes.
021 *
022 * <p>Any uncaught timeout or unexpected loading behavior typically results in a runtime exception.
023 *
024 * <p>Example usage within a test:
025 * <ul>
026 *   <li>Instantiating this class with a {@link SmartWebDriver} instance.</li>
027 *   <li>Calling <code>isVisible</code> or <code>waitToBeShown</code> / <code>waitToBeRemoved</code> methods.</li>
028 * </ul>
029 *
030 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
031 */
032public class LoaderServiceImpl extends AbstractComponentService<LoaderComponentType, Loader> implements LoaderService {
033
034   private static final String CHECK_VISIBILITY_USING_CONTAINER = "Checking visibility of loader %s using container";
035   private static final String CHECK_VISIBILITY_USING_LOCATOR = "Checking visibility of loader %s using locator %s";
036
037   private static final String WAIT_TO_BE_SHOWN_USING_CONTAINER =
038         "Waiting for loader %s to be shown using container for %d seconds";
039   private static final String WAIT_TO_BE_SHOWN = "Waiting for loader %s to be shown for %d seconds";
040   private static final String WAIT_TO_BE_SHOWN_USING_LOCATOR =
041         "Waiting for loader %s to be shown using locator %s for %d seconds";
042
043   private static final String WAIT_TO_BE_REMOVED_USING_CONTAINER =
044         "Waiting for loader %s to be removed using container for %d seconds";
045   private static final String WAIT_TO_BE_REMOVED = "Waiting for loader %s to be removed for %d seconds";
046   private static final String WAIT_TO_BE_REMOVED_USING_LOCATOR =
047         "Waiting for loader %s to be removed using locator %s for %d seconds";
048
049   /**
050    * Constructs a {@code LoaderServiceImpl} with the provided {@link SmartWebDriver}.
051    *
052    * @param driver the {@link SmartWebDriver} used to interact with web elements.
053    */
054   public LoaderServiceImpl(SmartWebDriver driver) {
055      super(driver);
056   }
057
058   /**
059    * Creates and returns a {@link Loader} component instance based on the provided
060    * {@link LoaderComponentType}.
061    *
062    * @param componentType the specific type of loader component.
063    * @return a new {@link Loader} instance for the given component type.
064    */
065   @Override
066   protected Loader createComponent(final LoaderComponentType componentType) {
067      return ComponentFactory.getLoaderComponent(componentType, driver);
068   }
069
070   /**
071    * Checks if the loader identified by the given component type is visible within the specified container.
072    *
073    * @param componentType the loader component type.
074    * @param container     the container to check for the loader.
075    * @return true if the loader is visible, otherwise false.
076    */
077   @Override
078   public boolean isVisible(final LoaderComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container) {
079      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECK_VISIBILITY_USING_CONTAINER, componentType));
080      return loaderComponent(componentType).isVisible(container);
081   }
082
083   /**
084    * Checks if the loader identified by the given component type is visible using the provided locator.
085    *
086    * @param componentType the loader component type.
087    * @param loaderLocator the locator identifying the loader.
088    * @return true if the loader is visible, otherwise false.
089    */
090   @Override
091   public boolean isVisible(final LoaderComponentType componentType, final By loaderLocator) {
092      LogUi.step(String.format(CHECK_VISIBILITY_USING_LOCATOR, componentType, loaderLocator));
093      return loaderComponent(componentType).isVisible(loaderLocator);
094   }
095
096   /**
097    * Waits for the loader to be shown within the specified container, using the given component type.
098    *
099    * @param componentType the loader component type.
100    * @param container     the container where the loader is expected.
101    * @param secondsShown  how many seconds to wait for the loader to appear.
102    */
103   @Override
104   public void waitToBeShown(final LoaderComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
105                             final int secondsShown) {
106      LogUi.step(String.format(WAIT_TO_BE_SHOWN_USING_CONTAINER, componentType, secondsShown));
107      loaderComponent(componentType).waitToBeShown(container, secondsShown);
108   }
109
110   /**
111    * Waits for the loader to be shown, using the provided component type, within the given time.
112    *
113    * @param componentType the loader component type.
114    * @param secondsShown  how many seconds to wait for the loader to appear.
115    */
116   @Override
117   public void waitToBeShown(final LoaderComponentType componentType, final int secondsShown) {
118      LogUi.step(String.format(WAIT_TO_BE_SHOWN, componentType, secondsShown));
119      loaderComponent(componentType).waitToBeShown(secondsShown);
120   }
121
122   /**
123    * Waits for the loader to be shown, identified by a specific locator, using the given component type.
124    *
125    * @param componentType the loader component type.
126    * @param loaderLocator the locator identifying the loader.
127    * @param secondsShown  how many seconds to wait for the loader to appear.
128    */
129   @Override
130   public void waitToBeShown(final LoaderComponentType componentType, final By loaderLocator, final int secondsShown) {
131      LogUi.step(String.format(WAIT_TO_BE_SHOWN_USING_LOCATOR, componentType, loaderLocator, secondsShown));
132      loaderComponent(componentType).waitToBeShown(loaderLocator, secondsShown);
133   }
134
135   /**
136    * Waits for the loader to be removed within the specified container, using the given component type.
137    *
138    * @param componentType  the loader component type.
139    * @param container      the container where the loader is expected to disappear.
140    * @param secondsRemoved how many seconds to wait for the loader to be removed.
141    */
142   @Override
143   public void waitToBeRemoved(final LoaderComponentType componentType, final SmartWebElement container,
144                               final int secondsRemoved) {
145      LogUi.step(String.format(WAIT_TO_BE_REMOVED_USING_CONTAINER, componentType, secondsRemoved));
146      loaderComponent(componentType).waitToBeRemoved(container, secondsRemoved);
147   }
148
149   /**
150    * Waits for the loader to be removed, using the provided component type, within the given time.
151    *
152    * @param componentType  the loader component type.
153    * @param secondsRemoved how many seconds to wait for the loader to be removed.
154    */
155   @Override
156   public void waitToBeRemoved(final LoaderComponentType componentType, final int secondsRemoved) {
157      LogUi.step(String.format(WAIT_TO_BE_REMOVED, componentType, secondsRemoved));
158      loaderComponent(componentType).waitToBeRemoved(secondsRemoved);
159   }
160
161   /**
162    * Waits for the loader to be removed, identified by a specific locator, using the given component type.
163    *
164    * @param componentType  the loader component type.
165    * @param loaderLocator  the locator identifying the loader.
166    * @param secondsRemoved how many seconds to wait for the loader to be removed.
167    */
168   @Override
169   public void waitToBeRemoved(final LoaderComponentType componentType, final By loaderLocator,
170                               final int secondsRemoved) {
171      LogUi.step(String.format(WAIT_TO_BE_REMOVED_USING_LOCATOR, componentType, loaderLocator, secondsRemoved));
172      loaderComponent(componentType).waitToBeRemoved(loaderLocator, secondsRemoved);
173   }
174
175   /**
176    * Retrieves or creates a loader for the specified loader component type.
177    *
178    * @param componentType the loader component type.
179    * @return an existing or newly created {@link Loader} instance.
180    */
181   private Loader loaderComponent(final LoaderComponentType componentType) {
182      return getOrCreateComponent(componentType);
183   }
184
185}
